# The Elements of Statistical Learning: Data Mining, Inference, and Prediction

::: {.column-margin}
____
Hastie, Trevor, et al. The elements of statistical learning: data mining, inference, and prediction. Vol. 2. New York: springer, 2009.
:::

##  The Elements of Statistical Learning {auto-animate=true}
- Supervised learning: predicts an outcome based on some input measures
    - Linear Methods: Regularization & Smoothing, Additive Trees
- Unsupervised learning: associates or clusters unlabeled input measures
  - random forests, neural networks, ensemble learning, and graphical models

##  The Elements of Statistical Learning {auto-animate=true}
::: {.fragment .highlight-blue}
- Supervised Learning: classification and regression

::: {.fragment .highlight-current-blue}
